recipe.name: Garlic Shrimp
recipe.notes: This is a pretty good shrimp marinade, reminds one of standard Chinese dishes.
recipe.preparation: Marinate shrimp in other ingredients for an hour or two.  Drain and broil or grill for 4-5 minutes per side.Variant marinades:  equal parts olive oil and vermouth; white wine and butter with tarragon; olive oil mixed with lemon juice, parsley and garlic.
recipe.source_name: "A Book Of Appetizers", Helen Evans Brown
